title: US Plan for Carbon Offsetting Raises Skepticism at COP27
description: John Kerry, the country’s climate envoy, was expected to announce the carbon offset plan on Wednesday. Payments from companies would go to countries struggling to adopt renewable energy.
dc:creator: Lisa Friedman
media:description: A coal power plant under construction in 2018 in the Sindh Province in southern Pakistan. A new U.S. program aims to help countries embrace renewable energy sources.
